name: The Wizard - Neutralising the Elements
description:
A submission for Global Game Jam 2022 - The original game jam submission can be found here - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/wizard-neutralising-elements-3

The elements have gone rogue! And who else could save the town other than the purple-gowned renowned elementalist - Purplius?! 

Fight off the elementals, and don't shoot blindly - use your knowledge and hit them with their weakness! How long can you hold out?

/// Shoot - Left Mouse

/// Change elements - Numbers 1-4
